Header: Namal Kumara says he does not have any mental issues
Content: The chief incumbent of Warakaapola Naa Sevena Sadaham Ashramaya, Suriyawewa Sumedha Thera says that there is no conspiracy to have see the assassination of the former president, Mahinda Rajapaksa or former defence secretary, Gotabhaya Rajapaksa. Media reports published in the last few weeks stating that Namal Kumara, who exposed the conspiracy, had set out to organize a ceremony under the patronage of former president Rajapaksa and former defence secretary Gotabhaya Rajapaksa. However, Suriyawewa Sumedha Thera believes that there was no such assassination conspiracy. General Secretary of Sinhale Jathika Balamuluwa, Arambepola Rathanasara Thera also expressed his views during todayâ€™s media conference. Meanwhile, at the same media conference, Operations Director of the Anti Corruption task force, Namal Kumara responded to allegations that have been made by certain factions, regarding his mental wellbeing.
